Articles.Content:
I have windows 8.1 and google chrome and I never have been able to load the kerbal wiki. 

Google Chrome could not load the webpage because[**www.kerbalspaceprogram.com**](http://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com) took too long to respond. The website may be down, or you may be experiencing issues with your Internet connection.

this is like the only page in the world i have had this problem with. Any help world be appreciated.
Same problem here with the same specs
Seems to be loading fine for me now.
